TextView.android:text: After launching the application PRESS the Start BUTTON. SELECT the first level called Simple.It will automatically open quiz window. You can see one question and its associated image,audio or video with four option BUTTON.Now SELECT your answer.If your answer is Correct,it will pop 'Correct!:)' else it will pop 'Wrong :('. It will then move to the next question. Earn enough score to pass this level to move on to the next one.Hints are also included whenever in need.
